thread.title: Haley Donaldson of Fossil Ridge is the student-athlete of the week
thread.title_full: Haley Donaldson of Fossil Ridge is the student-athlete of the week - The Denver Post

author: denverpost
title: Haley Donaldson of Fossil Ridge is the student-athlete of the week
text:
Haley Donaldson, Fossil Ridge Height: 5-foot-6. Weight: 135 pounds.
Age: 18. Born: July 20, 1997, in Fort Collins.
High school sport: Softball (shortstop entered regionals batting .750, with seven home runs and 29 RBIs).
Grade-point average: 3.9. Class: Senior.
My family: Parents Kim and John, brother Hunter.
Planned career: Considering nursing or physical therapy; will play softball at Nebraska.
iPhone or other: iPhone.
Twitter handle: @beanawonka.
Three apps I open every day: SnapChat, Instagram and Twitter.
Post Preps E-Mail Alerts & Newsletters Prepped Blog Post Preps photos Prep , stats, roster, schedule Favorite website: No favorite.
Computer or TV? Computer.
Energy drink or smoothie? Smoothie.
Pizza or burrito? Burrito.
Best prep sports moment so far: Probably being undefeated last year before state.
